src:
Zlikovec izpraznil otroška hranilnika
Vlomil je skozi balkonska vrata.
06 Nov 2019, 10:50 by A. L.
ČEPLJE – V ponedeljek so policisti v Čepljah obravnavali vlom v stanovanjsko hišo. Vlomilec je bil na delu, ko so bili lastniki na dopustu. V hišo je nasilno vstopil skozi balkonska vrata, preiskal prostore in iz dveh hranilnikov, ki ju je našel v otroški sobi, ukradel denar, so sporočili iz PU Celje.
text:
The villain emptied the baby's feeder
He broke through the balcony door.
06 Nov 2019, 10:50 by A.L.
CEPLJE - A police burglary in Ceplje on Monday dealt with a burglary of an apartment building. The burglar was at work when the owners were on vacation. He forcibly entered the house through a balcony door, searched the premises and stole money from two storage rooms he found in the children's room, according to the Celje Police Department.
